>
[Vigilant Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3442) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 79

**Archetypes** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=6), [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=12) (Level 20)

**Prerequisites**
[Druid Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=701) or [Wizard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=742)

</column>

---

Your mask grants the extraordinary magical senses of Carmine Jaws, the Hyena who Looks Between. You gain [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) as a [precise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=2406)  to a range of 60 feet. If you already have scent as a precise sense, increase its range by 60 feet. You can sometimes catch a faint whiff of magic itself. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell, your scent extends between worlds, like Carmine Jaws's own. This causes you to be able to smell [ethereal](/Traits.aspx?ID=63) creatures, those in an [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) space with an aperture that's within your scent range, [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures and objects, and other creatures and objects that are insubstantial or not fully in phase with reality. Unlike your normal scent, this is an [imprecise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=413).([concentrate](/Actions.aspx?ID=683), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93))[_unfettered movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732)

<title level="2">Masks of the Magic Warriors</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 78

In becoming Jatembe's new Magic Warriors, the heroes have unlocked secrets of magical potential that none have reached since the earliest Ten Magic Warriors walked the plazas of the Magaambya.

 On reaching 20th level, the heroes should have the option of taking one of these archetype feats, based on the type of animal they chose for their mask when they first created it in _Pathfinder Adventure Path #169: Kindled Magic_. These options are each themed to one of Jatembe's magic warriors, but if a hero's mask doesn't fit with a specific animal from this list or the player feels their animal embodies a different effect from the list, feel free to reflavor the feat names to fit the hero's spirit face. For instance, the Cunning Trickster mask could easily be a rodent or a fox, not just a spider.

**Related Feats**: [Cunning Trickster Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3433), [Emancipator's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3434), [Grand Medic's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3435), [Protective Spirit Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3436), [Sky Master Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3437), [Stalking Feline Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3438), [Storyteller's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3439), [Thick Hide Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3440), [Tireless Guide's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3441)
